description: Create and edit data in ActiveCampaign

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email of the contact to create

properties.name: updateIfExists
properties.description: Whether to update user if it exists already. If not set and user exists it will error instead.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Adds a custom fields to set also values which have not been predefined

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value of the field to set

properties.name: firstName
properties.description: The first name of the contact to create

properties.name: lastName
properties.description: The last name of the contact to create

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Phone number of the contact

properties.name: contactId
properties.description: ID of the contact to update

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: The fields to update

properties.name: email_like
properties.description: Filter contacts that contain the given value in the email address

properties.name: exclude
properties.description: Exclude from the response the contact with the given ID

properties.name: formid
properties.description: Filter contacts associated with the given form

properties.name: listid
properties.description: Filter contacts associated with the given list

properties.name: search
properties.description: Filter contacts that match the given value in the contact names, organization, phone or email

properties.name: segmentid
properties.description: Return only contacts that match a list segment

properties.name: seriesid
properties.description: Filter contacts associated with the given automation

properties.name: tagid
properties.description: Filter contacts associated with the given tag

properties.name: filters[created_before]
properties.description: Filter contacts that were created prior to this date

properties.name: filters[created_after]
properties.description: Filter contacts that were created after this date

properties.name: filters[updated_before]
properties.description: Filter contacts that were updated before this date

properties.name: filters[updated_after]
properties.description: Filter contacts that were updated after this date

properties.name: waitid
properties.description: Filter by contacts in the wait queue of an automation block

properties.name: orderBy
properties.description: Order contacts by creation date

properties.name: Email
properties.description: Order contacts by email

properties.name: First Name
properties.description: Order contacts by first name

properties.name: Last Name
properties.description: Order contacts by last name

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Order contacts by full name

properties.name: Score
properties.description: Order contacts by score

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a contact

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete a contact

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get data of a contact

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get data of many contacts

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a contact

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the deal

properties.name: contact
properties.description: The ID of the deal's contact

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency of the deal in 3-character ISO format

properties.name: group
properties.description: The pipeline ID of the deal

properties.name: stage
properties.description: The stage ID of the deal

properties.name: owner
properties.description: The owner ID of the deal

properties.name: percent
properties.description: The percentage of the deal

properties.name: dealId
properties.description: ID of the deal to update

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the deal

properties.name: dealNote
properties.description: The content of the deal note

properties.name: dealNoteId
properties.description: The ID of the deal note

properties.name: Create Note
properties.description: Create a deal note

properties.name: Update Deal Note
properties.description: Update a deal note

properties.name: externalid
properties.description: The ID of the order in the external service. ONLY REQUIRED IF EXTERNALCHECKOUTID NOT INCLUDED.

properties.name: externalcheckoutid
properties.description: The ID of the cart in the external service. ONLY REQUIRED IF EXTERNALID IS NOT INCLUDED.

properties.name: source
properties.description: The order source code (0 - will not trigger automations, 1 - will trigger automations)

properties.name: totalPrice
properties.description: The total price of the order in cents, including tax and shipping charges. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero.

properties.name: connectionid
properties.description: The ID of the connection from which this order originated

properties.name: customerid
properties.description: The ID of the customer associated with this order

properties.name: externalCreatedDate
properties.description: The date the order was placed

properties.name: abandonedDate
properties.description: The date the cart was abandoned. REQUIRED ONLY IF INCLUDING EXTERNALCHECKOUTID.

properties.name: orderProducts
properties.description: All ordered products

properties.name: price
properties.description: The price of the product, in cents. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero.

properties.name: quantity
properties.description: The quantity ordered

properties.name: category
properties.description: The category of the product

properties.name: sku
properties.description: The SKU for the product

properties.name: imageUrl
properties.description: An Image URL that displays an image of the product

properties.name: productUrl
properties.description: A URL linking to the product in your store

properties.name: taxAmount
properties.description: The total tax amount for the order in cents

properties.name: discountAmount
properties.description: The total discount amount for the order in cents

properties.name: orderUrl
properties.description: The URL for the order in the external service

properties.name: externalUpdatedDate
properties.description: The date the order was updated

properties.name: shippingMethod
properties.description: The shipping method of the order

properties.name: orderNumber
properties.description: The order number. This can be different than the externalid.

properties.name: orderId
properties.description: The ID of the e-commerce order

properties.name: externalupdatedDate
properties.description: The date the order was placed

properties.name: shippingAmount
properties.description: The total shipping amount for the order in cents

properties.name: ecommerceCustomerId
properties.description: ID of the E-commerce customer to update

properties.name: acceptsMarketing
properties.description: Whether customer has opt-ed in to marketing communications

properties.name: Get by Product ID
properties.description: Get data of a ordered product

properties.name: Get by Order ID
properties.description: Get data of an order's products

properties.name: service
properties.description: The name of the service

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name associated with the account in the external service. Often this will be a company name (e.g., "My Toystore, Inc.").

properties.name: logoUrl
properties.description: The URL to a logo image for the external service

properties.name: linkUrl
properties.description: The URL to a page where the integration with the external service can be managed in the third-party's website

properties.name: syncStatus
properties.description: The status of a sync triggered on the connection (0 = sync stopped; 1 = sync running)

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Adds a custom fields to set also values which have not been predefined

properties.name: fieldValue
properties.description: Value of the field to set

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of the account to update

properties.name: accountUrl
properties.description: Account's website

properties.name: tagType
properties.description: Tag contact

properties.name: Template
properties.description: Tag template

properties.name: tagId
properties.description: ID of the tag to update

properties.name: accountContactId
properties.description: ID of the account contact to delete

properties.name: Remove
properties.description: Remove contact from a list
